content: a sword wraps around this slouchy beanie which was inspired by the deeds of suffer-not-injustice vimes and the rallying cry of the wee free men in terry pratchett s discworld novels the pattern calls for sport weight yarn in the following quantities 130 m/ 142 yards in main colour 60 m/ 65 yards in contrast colour the sample hat was knitted in cheviot yarn from the hebridean woolshed main colour white and rauma finullgarn contrast colour black the final picture shows a composite of how the motif would look if it were knitted flat if you re interested in my design choices and the genesis of this hat you can read about that here https //jaggedlines substack com/p/how-i-knitted-the-no-kings-hat
